# <i class="fas fa-user section-icon"></i> About Me

Data Science & Analytics graduate student at California State University, Chico with a strong background in Computer Engineering. Currently pursuing Master of Science in Data Science and Analytics with a 3.52 GPA.

**Professional Summary:** I am an experienced professional with expertise in web development, data analysis, and machine learning. My technical skills span across Python, R, PHP, Java, and various data science tools. I have a strong background in software development and data visualization, coupled with proven leadership experience in student organizations. I am passionate about leveraging data to drive insights and create impactful solutions that make a difference.

**Key Achievements:** I have successfully led web development projects at Kohli Media LLP with 6 members, where I contributed to the company's digital presence. My work in machine learning includes developing models for autonomous vehicles, specifically focusing on speed breaker and lane detection. As the President of the Indian Student Association, I have demonstrated strong leadership skills, and my role as a Global Ally at International Education & Global Engagement has allowed me to support and mentor international students.

A full-stack e-commerce platform developed using PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. The project features:

- **Shopping Features**: Developed shopping cart functionality with real-time updates and secure checkout process

::: project-item
## <i class="fas fa-car"></i> Speed Breaker & Lane Detection using Machine Learning

An advanced computer vision project for autonomous vehicles that:

- **Technology Stack**: Utilized OpenCV and TensorFlow for real-time detection
- **Algorithm Implementation**: Implemented YOLO (You Only Look Once) algorithm for efficient object detection
- **Core Features**: 
  - Real-time video feed processing
  - Accurate speed breaker detection (92% accuracy)
  - Lane marking identification and tracking
  - Integration with vehicle control systems
- **Technical Achievements**:
  - Optimized model for real-time performance
  - Implemented multi-threading for parallel processing
  - Developed custom data augmentation pipeline
  - Created comprehensive testing framework
:::
